meanings.sent1: The document was so small and clear that it was easily microfilmable.
meanings.sent2: The library decided to make the old newspapers microfilmable for preservation purposes.
meanings.sent3: I never thought a tiny bug could be microfilmable, but there it was, captured on film!
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like microfilmable images, preserved and ready to be revisited.
meanings.sent5: The professor's explanation was as microfilmable as a photograph, easy to remember and refer back to.
